items.sentence: It seems like Tom is having a hard time doing that.
It took Tom a moment to realize what was happening.
It turns out that Tom never graduated from college.
What\'s the nicest thing Tom has ever done for you?
Do you think Tom would like me to help him do that?
Do you think that anyone would care if we did that?
We probably shouldn\'t have sung that song tonight.
Do you think there\'s any chance of that happening?
Do you think things like that don\'t really matter?
Tom and Mary are both good at French, aren\'t they?
